title: Postseason
custom_preconds:
iPhone with iOS 9
Apple Watch with Watch OS2

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is in the Apple Watch App on Watch OS2
and long presses the Scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the menu item and icon: Scoreboard, Playoffs, Teams, Favorite Team (if applicable)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is in the Apple Watch App
and long presses the Scoreboard
and the user taps on team in the postseason
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to the team page

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is on the team page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see
-Current postseason game (schedule or in progress)
-Photo
-Article headline
-Previous game
-Headlines

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is in the app menu
and taps on the Postseason icon
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be brought to the current series (WC, DS, LCS, WS)
and the matchups/games in that series

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on a matchup in the postseason series view
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is brought to all games between those two teams with the first game on the bottom

title: Regular Season
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed on iPhone and Apple Watch
custom_steps: When a user taps on the At Bat app on Apple Watch

custom_steps_separated.expected: launch the app displays the Team View with recent game and team news

custom_steps_separated.content: with a Favorite Team and taps on the recent game
with a Favorite Team and taps on a news article
custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the article will open

image, headline, blurb

custom_steps_separated.content: when a user is on an article and taps the back button
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user will return to the team view

custom_steps_separated.content: with a Favorite Team and long presses the watch face
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user should see a prompt for Teams or Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content: with a Favorite Team and long presses the watch face and taps on Teams
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user will see a alphabetical list of the teams and the logos are correct

custom_steps_separated.content: when the user is on the team picker and the user taps on a team
custom_steps_separated.expected: displays the team view with recent game and team news

custom_steps_separated.content: when the user long presses the watch face and taps Scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user will see the scoreboard for the current configured date

title: Apple Watch - Complication
custom_preconds: Given the user has At Bat installed an iPhone and Apple Watch
custom_steps:
When the user is on the Watch Face
and Watch Face is either Modular or Utility
custom_expected:
Then the user can add the At Bat complication

https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT205536

Modular Small
Modular Large
Utility - Large

title: Apple Watch - Small Complication - No Favorite Team
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iOS device with Apple Watch pair
and At Bat Debug build installed on both
and small complication setup on the Watch face

![](index.php?/attachments/get/2262)
custom_steps:
When a user has no favorite team set
and looks at the small complication
custom_expected:
Then the user should see the following:

[MLB.com Silhouette]
[# Games Today] Gms

title: Apple Watch - Small Complication - Preview
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iOS device with Apple Watch pair
and At Bat Debug build installed on both
and small complication setup on the Watch face

![](index.php?/attachments/get/2264)
custom_steps:
When a user has a favorite team set
and the team has a game in preview state
and the user looks at the small complication
custom_expected:
Then the user should see the following:

[Start Time]
[Home/Away] [Club ID Opponent]

Home - vs
Away - @

title: Apple Watch - Small Complication - Score Change
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iOS device with Apple Watch pair
and At Bat Debug build installed on both
and small complication setup on the Watch face

![](index.php?/attachments/get/2268)
custom_steps:
When a user has a favorite team set
and one of the team scores
and the user looks at the small complication
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the updated score
and see only 1 timeline entry only

[Away Club ID] [Away Score]
[Home Club ID] [Home Score]
